## Risk Register Template

Copy this table into your project README, issue, or spreadsheet to track risks consistently.

| ID | Risk description | Impact (High/Med/Low) | Likelihood (High/Med/Low) | Owner | Mitigation / Action | Status |
|----|------------------|-----------------------:|--------------------------:|-------|---------------------|--------|
| 1  | Example: Third-party API rate limits during peak release | High | Medium | @owner | Add retries and circuit breaker; coordinate release windows | Open |

Guidance:
- Update the register weekly and before key milestones.
- For high-impact or high-likelihood risks, escalate to PM and Product Lead.
